original_title: Rotting Christ: Performing Their Early Days Songs
overview: This Video shooted  on the 6th of July 2020  at Artworks Studios for the needs of Metal Mexico Festival ( https://mxmf.com.mx ) Live  Streaming on July 19th 2020 Mixed & Mastered by Callmelazy (aka Costas Gavakos)  at Soundflakes Studio Directed by:Yiannis Margetousakis-Thanos Liberopoulos Edited by: Yiannis Margetousakis-Thanos Liberopoulos-Manolis Rizikos Cameras: Thanos Liberopoulos- Yiannis Margetousakis-Panos Iliopoulos  01 - The Sign of the Evil Existence 02 - Transform All Suffering Into Plagues 03 - The Fifth Illusion 04 - Non Serviam 05 - Fgmenth Thy Gift 06 - Exiled Archangels 07 - King of a Stellar War 08 - Archon 09 - Ach Golgotha 10 - Feast of The Grant Whore 11 - The Nereid of Esgalduin 12 - The Forest of N'Gai 13 - Visions of The Dead Lovers 14 - The Fourth Knight of Revelation
title: Rotting Christ: Performing Their Early Days Songs
